name: ZenSpaRelaxingSound|Relaxyourmind
0:
”Alexa, play Zen Spa”
”Alexa, open Zen Spa”
”Alexa, start Zen Spa”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: zen spa
des:
Zen Spa is a relaxing sound for Yoga, Massage, Spa, Meditation or Sleep. Relax your mind and body with this skill.
Enhance your relaxation, meditation, sleep, brain function and concentration.


How to use "Zen Spa: Relaxing Sound | Relax your mind"?

You can say:
- "Alexa, open Zen Spa"
- "Alexa, start Zen Spa"
- "Alexa, play Zen Spa"

It will automatically play the sound indefinitely until you say "Alexa, stop".


How to set a timer?

First, you need to play the sound using one of the above method. Then, you can limit the time the sound will play by saying "Alexa, stop playing in 1 hour" (or however long you want it to last). Once 1 hour has passed, the sound will stop playing.


How to support us?

Your review is extremely important and it shows us your support. Please consider leaving a review if you love the skill. Your review encourages us to continue making more skills.


Listen to more relaxing sounds?

You can say "Alexa, open Zen Spa and send me other relaxing sounds" and the skill will send you an email containing other relaxing sounds you can try. It'll not only contain the name of the skill but also, contain direct link to the skill and you can enable it easily.

Or, you can search in the Alexa Skill store the following skills:
- Zen Spa
- Forest Birdsong
- Forest Birds
- Study Music
- Zen Meditation
- Beautiful Piano
- Forest Campfire
- Stress Relief
- Tropical Birds
- Waves Sandy Beach
- Morning Tweet Tweet
- Focus Music
- Cave Water Drips
- Public Park
- Tribal Festival
